resources.string:
This app gives basic introduction into trains mechanic.
Bellow you can see buttons: paths, sequenses and about.
Paths button opens menu of paths.
Sequenses button opens menu of sequenses of vagons.
About button opens detailed description of current app.
Above you can see graph of pressure index changing by position of path. %d
Oscillations that occur under the influence of an external periodic force are called forced oscillations.
In this case, the external force performs positive work and ensures the influx of energy to the oscillatory system. It does not allow oscillations to decay, despite the action of frictional forces.
If the frequency of the external force approaches the natural frequency, there is a sharp increase in the amplitude of the forced oscillations. This phenomenon is called resonance.

This is sequenses menu.
Bellow you can see buttons to:
Custom: create your own sequense of vagons;
Random: get random sequense of vagons to test.

This app gives basic introduction into trains mechanic. It has the following features:

  1. Sequence.

    • Allows to create custom sequence with certain vagon count and certain mass, and then optimize they mutual arrangement to minimize risks while movement.

    • Random sequence is the same, but creates random vagons count with random masses.

  2. Paths. Choice of certain path from the list allows you to test train movement on the path. Also path info is available in the path menu.

  3. The app supports english and russian languages.

  4. Also you can write your questions and suggestions in the support.
Please, feel free to write your questions and suggestions to our support.

Line data shown on current railway path is shown as vertical data represented as changing array of numbers. To test any vagon movement on current path you can choose Path Test and testify your custom vagon.
Purpose of this app is calculating train movement mechanics.
In a Sequences menu you can choose custom or random vagon sequence to test.
In a custom sequence you can set your own amount of vagons and their masses.
Random sequence generates amount of vagons and their masses by itself.
In Paths menu you can find a list of Kazakhstan train paths.
You can learn about certain path in a path info window.
Path testing is calculation train movement parameters.
If you have any questions and suggestions, we would be glad if you write us.
